text: Akasachijinjisyaga chilo m’muusi (ni kuleupa muusi kwipipa chilo mpela ndawi jachitukuta), ni akwinjisyaga soni muusi m’chilo (ni kuleupa chilo kwipipa muusi mpela ndawi jakusisima), ni alijepepesye lyuwa ni mwesi, yosope ikwenda kwandema jakwe jekolanjidwe, Jwalakwe ni Allah M’mbuje gwenu, uchimwene ni Wakwe. Sano awala wankwawenda kunneka Jwalakwe nganakola (chindu chilichose namuno chamwana nti chisawu) chikowa cha lupele lwa tende
